move-that-for-you.control-title: Allow players to move this tile

move.label: Player Move
move.note: Allow players to move the tile

rotate.label: Player Rotate
rotate.note: Allow players to rotate the tile

configure-bounds.name: Boundary Configuration
configure-bounds.hint: Define movement restricting boundaries for the current scene.

fit-in-bounds.name: Fit within boundary
fit-in-bounds.hint: Only updates that fit the whole placeable within boundaries will be permitted.

configure-bounds-key.name: Boundary Configuration
configure-bounds-key.hint: Opens boundary configuration for the current scene.

enable-tile-controls.name: Tile Controls
enable-tile-controls.hint: Activates the module for tiles. (GAME RELOAD REQUIRED)

enable-token-controls.name: Token Controls
enable-token-controls.hint: Activates the module for tokens. (GAME RELOAD REQUIRED)

enable-hud-buttons.name: Insert Permission Button to HUD
enable-hud-buttons.hint: When enabled a new button will be added to Tile/Token HUDs to control module permissions.
